bill.title: Parking a Vehicle on a Bicycle Lane or Pathway; Fine
bill.description: Sets a flat fine of $200 for parking a vehicle on a bicycle lane or pathway. (HB1706 CD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Passed First Reading
Referred to TRN, JUD, referral sheet 3
Bill scheduled to be heard by TRN on Wednesday, 01-29-14 10:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 9 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Takayama, Aquino, Har, Ichiyama, Nakashima, Takumi, Yamashita, Fukumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Ing.
Reported from TRN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 79-14) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Say excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Friday, 02-07-14 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, Har, Belatti, Brower, Ito, C. Lee, Nakashima, Tsuji, Wooley, McDermott, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Creagan, Kawakami.
Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 557-14), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Hanohano voting no (1) and Representative(s) Tokioka excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 42).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to TIA, JDL.
Re-Referred to TIA, WAM.
The committee(s) on TIA has scheduled a public hearing on 03-18-14 1:16PM in conference room 224.

The committee(s) on TIA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes in TIA were as follows: 8 Aye(s): Senator(s) English, Dela Cruz, Espero, Gabbard, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Kouchi, Solomon; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
Reported from TIA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 2962) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading and referral to WAM.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading and referred to WAM.
The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-28-14 9:30AM in conference room 211.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 13 Aye(s): Senator(s) Ige, Kidani, Chun Oakland, Dela Cruz, English, Espero, Kahele, Keith-Agaran, Kouchi, Ruderman, L. Thielen, Tokuda, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3354) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 1).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-08-14.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 2 (Galuteria, Hee). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 539) in amended form (SD 1).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 676).
Re-referred to TRN, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 55
Senate Conferees Appointed: English Chair; Espero Co-Chair; Slom Member.
House Conferees Appointed: Yamane, Rhoads, Takayama Co-Chairs; McDermott Member.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 684).
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 673).
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Wednesday, 04-16-14 2:45PM in conference room 225.
Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Tuesday 04-22-14 2:45PM in conference room 225.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Rhoads, Takayama; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) McDermott.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) English, Espero, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 27-14) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-29-14.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 27-14).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-29-14.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 25 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Ito excused (1).
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 720).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 751).
Transmitted to Governor.
